articles.content: Looks like World Cup frenzy has already got India in its firm grip - and the India-Pakistan match is at the center of it all. All roads, and air-routes, lead to the Motera stadium in Ahmedabad, which… [+1823 chars]

articles.description: Shillong Teer first and second-round numbers for July 17 will be announced at meghalayateer.com. Shillong Teer is a unique archery-based lottery game conducted by the Khasi Hills Archery Sports Association.

articles.title: Asian Athletics Championships: India finish 3rd behind China and Japan with 27 medals - India Today
articles.description: India finished 3rd in the medal table at the Asian Athletics Championships 2023 with 27 medals, including 6 Golds. India finished behind Japan and China.
articles.content: By Press Trust of India: Unheralded Abha Khatua equalled shot put national record while finishing second in a surprise performance while Jyothi Yarraji and Parul Chaudhary clinched their second medal… [+4748 chars]

articles.title: After spin trial, India lose pace battle against Bangladesh - The Indian Express
articles.description: Marufa Akter troubled the Indians with pace and movement to snare 4/29 while leg-spinner Rabeya Khan returned figures of 3/30 as India went down by 40 runs (DLS method) in a rain-affected game.
articles.content: If it was spin that troubled India in the womens T20I series against Bangladesh, Harmanpreet Kaur & Co faltered against pace on Sunday as they suffered their first-ever defeat to their neighbours… [+3093 chars]
